sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRIN_ID ,PRIN_SIGNOR,TRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(designation,'''',''),'"',''),',',''),CHR(10),''),'\','')) DESIGNATION,ISSUE_PLACE FROM GIIS_PRIN_SIGNTRY UNION ALL SELECT 111111 TRIAL_ID,TRIAL_TITLE||' '||TRIAL_NAME TRIAL ,TRIAL_DESIGNATION,ADDRESS1||' '||ADDRESS2 ADDRESS FROM BONDS_AUTHENTICITY A,BONDS_AUTHENTICITY_ADDRESS B WHERE A.TRIAL_ID = B.TRIAL_ID )ORDER BY PRIN_ID DESC
